snippet.title: Quiet Rehabilitation Gameplay Video 1
snippet.description:
Watch the first-gameplay teaser of Quiet Rehabilitation, an upcoming Half-Life 2 single-player modification. Bringing a different story of Gordon Freeman being taken prisoner directly to Nova Prospekt.

This video showcases a short gameplay of the mod by going through a variety of enemies and levels.

Follow Quiet Rehabilitation:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/quiet-rehabilitation

#HalfLife2 #Mod #QuietRehabilitation
